content.rendered: The A2212 1400 Kv BLDC Motor for Drone equips shaft of 3.7mm. This Motor is equipped with the solid metal case which makes it reliable and durable in the crash. This A2212 1400 KV BLDC Motor comes with open wire end for your customize connections.

excerpt.rendered:
1 x 1000KV BLDC Motor

1 x Prop Adapter

A Motor Holder (X-type) and set of screws

Shaft Length 10 mm

Shaft Diameter 3 mm

Max. Efficiency Current: 6-12A

Max. Efficiency Current: 6-12A

The steel design is capable of withstanding competitional conditions.

Lightweight design makes them suitable for a wide range of Quadcopter and Hexacopter Frames.

Smooth throttle response for best RC experience.
